name: King on the Mountain
description:
Become the King on the Mountain by building your fortress atop the highest peak. Place more rooms to gain access to new resources, but be mindful and make sure your structure is well balanced. If left too unstable, the only thing you'll witness is your castle's downfall.

This game was made in under 72 hours for the 49th Ludum Dare.
Theme: Unstable

CONTROLS

  • Point and Click to select and place rooms
  • Hover over a room button to see the description
  • Use the mouse-wheel to zoom in and out
  • Hold RMB and drag the mouse to move the camera, or use WASD or the arrow keys
